if I understand correctly, there is no way for gzweb to get initial camera pose
http://gazebosim.org/tutorials/?tut=ros_comm

k-okada@kokada-t440s:~$ gztopic list
/gazebo/default/pose/local/info
/gazebo/default/pose/info
/gazebo/default/gui
/gazebo/default/response
/gazebo/default/world_stats

Am I correct?
